title: Reading Zen and the Art of Motorcycle Maintenance: Chapter 14 - Part 2
description:
This chapter introduces the concept of peace of mind, critiques reason, observes how topsy turvy our world has become​ and gets to the very root of the matter. 

You're also going to see examples of what John Vervaeke names the Meaning Crisis and the Flow State
And Jonathan Pageau's 
Topsy Turvy World: https://youtu.be/t5mEijjyce4
Sychronicity: https://youtu.be/l9Ibs67ke6c
